title: #140: Free Speech Isn’t Free
description:
The most important press freedom case of our generation is currently happening with almost zero coverage from the bought-off mainstream media and their counterparts around the world.

Julian Assange is currently in solitary confinement inside Belmarsh Prison in the UK for having the audacity to expose some of the numerous and neverending war crimes committed by the United States government and their partners in terror.

As the Biden administration begins the process of labeling those they consider to stand in opposition to their agenda as “domestic terrorists”, the fight for freedom of speech will become the next battlefield, unless the people willingly give up their rights in exchange for the promise of security.
